usage.cn: 有本事任性的人，也要有本事坚强
usage.eng: Who is able to be egotistical needs to be strong too.

usage.cn: 深藏不露是一种了不起的才能。
usage.eng: It is a great ability to be able to conceal one's ability.

usage.cn: 当你能飞的时候就不要放弃飞。当你能梦的时候就不要放弃梦。当你能爱的时候就不要放弃爱。
usage.eng: Don't give up when you are able to fly,to dream and to love.

usage.cn: 我们相信能在数量上更好地使客户满意。
usage.eng: We believe we shall be able to better satisfy our customers quantitatively.
